titles.title: Strengthening Behavioral Health Parity Act
Strengthening Behavioral Health Parity Act
Strengthening Behavioral Health Parity Act
To strengthen parity in mental health and substance use disorder benefits.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 116-692, Part I.
Committee on Ways and Means discharged.
Committee on Education and Labor discharged.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 575.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services
